title: MMR Rakish SL XC & Adrenaline SL road bikes get F1 Fernando Alonso special editions
content:
Spanish bikemaker MMR’s top lightweight carbon Rakish SL cross-country and Adrenaline SL road bikes get custom Fernando Alonso special editions, celebrating the return to racing of the Spanish F1 driver. A longtime cyclist from the same Asturias province on the northern coast of Spain as MMR, Alonso has been riding both the XC Rakish SL […]

The post MMR Rakish SL XC & Adrenaline SL road bikes get F1 Fernando Alonso special editions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
